website_summaries.verdict: Solid alternative to a ball that stands up better than most to heavy chewing.
pros: It bounces, but not like a ball
Comes in 2 sizes: 3.5-inch diameter and 4.5-inch diameter
Most dogs can chew for a long time without even leaving teeth marks on the toy
The middle hole allows you to put a treat in the toy
cons: The doughnut toy shape not as interesting to some dogs as a ball

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey!
customer_reviews.text: This was a little pricey considering that it had a lifetime guarantee and claimed to be indestructible. I contacted the manufacturer and it was only guaranteed for a certain size of dog. My dog was too large (47 lbs). Do a little more research before believing the guarantee and indestructible statements!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be indestructible!
customer_reviews.text: This dog, a young Shiba Inu, is such a destructive chewer that he only has 3 steady toys, and this is one of them. He loves to chase it when I send it rolling across the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Sunfish

customer_reviews.title: Horrible for aggressive chewers
customer_reviews.text: This toy was no match for our aggressive chewing labradoodle. He got through it in 30 minutes, and no that is not an exaggeration. He removed a large chunk almost 2in wide from the ring. Will definitely be sending it back to the manufacturer, but know that they do not give you your money back- they just send a new toy. So our dog will get 1 hour total of enjoyment out of this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power chewer pitty approved!!
customer_reviews.text: Still after about 3 weeks, my two putties, Frenchie and Olde English Bulldog have not put even a dent in this toy. They love it!!! I love it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Medus

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible and a favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this toy. It's the only one my dog can't tear up and she absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A Hansen

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this
customer_reviews.text: This bounces as well as rolls. My dog loves it and is unable to destroy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Toy
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves this toy! She chews up everything but this seems indestructible which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good things about Ruff Dawg products
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about Ruff Dawg products . I always recommend them. My dog walks around carrying the dawgnut and small ball in his mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: It’s resistant
customer_reviews.text: My dog love it. It been playing with ir for two day, normally she destroys toy in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Maio

customer_reviews.title: Super durable even with a pit!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pit bull who chews through everything. This dawg nut actually holds up to a dog who chews on car tires
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Koonce

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Durable and my dis loves it. I’m buying many of this manufacturers products!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not Indestructible!
customer_reviews.text: This item is supposed to be indestructible, my aggressive chewer had pieces coming off it within 15 minutes. Epic Fail! And a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Gibber

customer_reviews.title: Tough toy
customer_reviews.text: My dog cannot destroy this, I finally found something!!!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible toy
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy usually tears every toy up that we give him. He has destroyed many that claimed to be indestructible! He hasn't been able to tear this toy up!! He loves it!! This toy is truly indestructible!!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Goss

customer_reviews.title: Best toys ever!
customer_reviews.text: These toys are the absolute best. I have three large dogs that tear through everything from kennels to walls. I’ve tried Kong, Nylabone, and everything else to no avail. This product is amazing. They haven’t been able to bite it into pieces, and after three months, it is still in tact. I was always worried about them swallowing the pieces but no longer have that concern. I have three of these and all have held up wonderfully. This is the only brand I will buy from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: We have two Australian Shepherds and they love this toy! We take it to the dog park and the love to run around with it and play fetch. That being said, I don’t let them have it otherwise because they are strong chewers and I don’t want them to ruin their favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

product_meta.title: Ruff Dawg DAWGNUT Dawgnut Dog Toy
product_meta.description: Made in the USA, indestructible rubber dog toy with a lifetime guarantee, 3.5 inch diameter for small dogs up to 40 lbs., comes in assorted bright Neon colors.
feature_bullets: The Package Weight Of The Product Is 0.3444 Pounds
